channel.title: Projects on Sebastian Esponda
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sebastian Esponda

item.title: Project 1: Bank Customer Churn
item.description: Created a model in Python to predict customer churn in the company.The sucess prediction accuracy is 86 %. Exploratory data analysis including a variety of graphics and descriptive statistics. Engineered features like One-hot Encoding for categorical features and Standard Scaler for numerical. Built different models: SVM, Logistic, Random Forest, XGBoost using scikit-learn library to find the best model. Model Evaluation applying metrics such as: ROC Curve, Confusion Matrix,Feature Importance. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Forecasting Weather with Neural Prophet
item.description: Testing neural Prophet based on Pytorch and deep learning techniques. Dataset which contains Australian Weather information from 2008 to 2017. Visualized past and future predictions of the next 1000 events. Achieved 2.18 MAE (Mean Absolute Error) and 2.95 RMSE. Descomposed forecast components and model parameters. Link to GitHub Repository
